name: tm47
effect: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Spreads hard-edged
wings and slams
into the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Spreads hard-
edged wings and
slams into the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
wings of steel.
It may also raise
the user’s DEFENSE.

swiftly, reducing the target’s
Speed stat.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:

lowering its Sp. Def stat.
